description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmfa7","text":"Scleroderma remains a debilitating autoimmune condition with immunological linkage to HLA sequences remaining open for further explanation. Through understanding the linkage of specific HLAs to scleroderma, the immunological processes behind the condition can be elucidated. HLA meta-analysis with scleroderma offers a prognostic application to best interpret the odds of scleroderma given a specific HLA. We hope to conduct a meta-analysis to determine how HLA-DQB1*0301, HLA-DQB1*0501, and HLA-DQA1*0301 are linked with scleroderma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâ€™s working

{"blocks":[{"key":"5psj7","text":"Amendments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"580rg","text":"None","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dash","text":"Support","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq044","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f5un","text":"Sources: No financial sources used","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78c1o","text":"Sponsor: Lake Erie College of Osteopathic Medicine- Bradenton","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h3q0","text":"Role of Sponsor: to facilitate ethical research and oversee the research process from start to end","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29k7g","text":"Rationale","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tnem","text":"Scleroderma remains a debilitating autoimmune condition with immunological linkage to HLA sequences remaining open for further explanation. Through understanding the linkage of specific HLAs to scleroderma, the immunological processes behind the condition can be elucidated. In addition, HLA meta-analysis with scleroderma offers a prognostic application to best interpret the odds of scleroderma given a specific HLA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hgpe","text":"Objectives","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ms6b","text":"We hope to conduct a meta-analysis to determine how HLA-DQB1*0301, HLA-DQB1*0501, and HLA-DQA1*0301 are linked with scleroderma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"364iu","text":"Eligibility criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uh7v","text":"Only studies between 1995 and 2022 are included.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a6cl","text":"Information sources","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e32mv","text":"Google Scholar and Pubmed will be accessed during the duration of the study to gather data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dtrc4","text":"Study records","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kbbd","text":"15a: Data will be examined using Revman 5.4 and/or MetaXL as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1as8g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhbcr","text":"Data management","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9opi8","text":"Data will be collected by two researchers and will be compiled on a document. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"796vr","text":"Selection process","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6de4h","text":"To be included, articles must: contain odds ratio (or enough data to calculate it), be in English, and must use living human test subjects. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gotu","text":" Inadequate information for meta-analysis, studies with flawed design, or meta-analyses on the same HLAs are not included. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgrf5","text":"Data collection process","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqs4i","text":"Two researchers will individually find and compare studies for inclusion. If in disagreement, researchers will present the study to the PI for the PI to make the final decision on whether to include the information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apt0j","text":"Data Items","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddt4","text":"Data collected will include case numbers, control numbers, associated p values if available, the samples studied, odds ratios, confidence intervals, and the name as well as year of the study examined.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bri2","text":"Outcomes and prioritization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eam1b","text":"HLA-DQB1*0301, HLA-DQB1*0501, and HLA-DQA1*0301 will specifically be examined.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29mfl","text":"Risk of bias in individual studies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beeo1","text":"The NIH Quality Assessment of case-control studies tool will be used for risk of bias assessment as well as a generated DOI plot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77ifh","text":"15b: I^2 will be used as a method of examining heterogeneity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kghh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpk88","text":"15c: MetaXL or Revman 5.4 are used if needed for sensitivity analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap66b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"54t5q","text":"15d: Quantitative synthesis is appropriate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cs1tl","text":"Meta-bias and confidence in cumulative evidence","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"claso","text":"GRADE criteria will be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a0pu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
